name: follow
description: Follow a podcast in this channel matching the search keyword(s)

options.name: keywords
options.description: Keyword(s) used to find podcast to follow

options.name: channel
options.description: (Optional) Specify channel to use instead of current.

name: follow-rss
description: Follow a podcast in this channel using an RSS feed

options.name: feed
options.description: RSS feed used to identified podcast to follow

options.name: channel
options.description: (Optional) Specify channel to use instead of current.

name: unfollow
description: Unfollow a podcast in this channel using the Podcast Id

options.name: id
options.description: Podcast Id used to identified podcast to unfollow

options.name: channel
options.description: (Optional) Specify channel to use instead of current.

name: following
description: Replies with the list of all podcasts (Ids & Names) followed in this channel

options.name: channel
options.description: (Optional) Specify channel to use instead of current.

name: search
description: Replies with up to 4 podcasts matching the search keyword(s)

name: settings
description: Displays prioritization and tags (Patreon member exclusive)

name: prioritize
description: Prioritize podcast for fastest episode processing (Patreon member exclusive)

options.name: id
options.description: Podcast Id of podcast to prioritize

name: tag
description: Tag role for episode announcements; No role clears tags (Patreon member exclusive)

options.name: id
options.description: Podcast Id of podcast to tag

options.name: role
options.description: Role to tag episode announcements with

name: help
description: Replies with a some helpful information and links

options.name: test
options.description: Sends a series of test messages to validate permissions
